title: AIM Centre RMIT: student work 1997-1998

abstract: 1995: Metamorphosis (Various, 4 min. total)--Washing machine (Various, 9 min. total)--Interactive previews (Various, 9 min. total)--The Albatross (Wendy Tyrer, 5 min.)--Flare (Craig L. Brookes, 6 min.)--La Maison des Cochons (David Harris, 4 min.)-- Not the chosen one (Yongki Liawinata, 4 min.)--Pharmaceutical girl (Dik Jarman, 7 min.)--The Pyre of Triune (Jasmin de Wolf, 5 min.) --Octikuki (Csaba Szamosy, 4 min.)--The Joker, the thief (Dermot Egan, 7 min.)--Essence of terror (Sophie Raymond, 5 min.). 1998: Metamorphosis (Various, 3 min. total)--Hunter (Thamoen Saichcmpoo, 2 min.)--Noir (1 min.)--The Shed (Ben McGill 1 min.)--During that time (Kyungbo Na, 4 min.)--Shedding the dead things in my head (David Witteveen, 1 min.)--Darn Tootin (Paul English, 2 min.)--Violin (Fiona Dyson, 5 mins.)--Ithaca (Peter Agas, 5 min.)--The Greatest untold story (Paul English, 5 min.)--Street kids (Licia R. da Silva, 4 mins.)--The Last straw (Roman Stolz, 7 min.)--Beak out (Glen Dunstan, 3 min.)--Anne the dog (Terry Attard, 1 min.)--All ears (Ben McGill, 6 min.)--Interactive previews (Various, 2 mins.)
description: Episode of Series "RMIT Collection". For more information on AIM student works go to: http://minyos.its.rmit.edu.au/~rpyjp/AIMmain.html
